name: vue2-dynamic-module-federation
description: A dynamic module federation built with Vue.js 2

scripts.start: concurrently --names "Host,App-1,App-2" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run start -w host" "npm run start -w app-1" "npm run start -w app-2"
scripts.build: concurrently --names "Host,App-1,App-2" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run build -w host" "npm run build -w app-1" "npm run build -w app-2"
